description:
Are you ready to immerse yourself in a fast-paced first-person shooter? Sniper Strike 3D is an amazing story game where you have to fight against a lot of villains, save innocent people and bring justice. Various types of weapons will help you hone your skills with pleasure, completing many interesting missions. Be careful, because the opponents will also have their own snipers who will not give you a chance to win. Therefore, our game is one of the best.


Functions:
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Interesting story campaign
- Variety of weapons
- Smooth controls
- Rescue hostages and become the best army sniper
name: Sniper Strike 3D -  Secret elite mission warfare "GHOST SQUAD"
